address.notFound: I didn't understand the address you asked me, can you repeat?
address.error: I'm sorry, there was an error. Can you try again?

house.error: Unfortunately I don't know where you live but I'm improving every day. What else can I do?

geolocation.error: Unfortunately I can't get your position. Please try again.
geolocation.denied: I'm sorry but I need to know your position to help you. Can I do anything else?

answer.welcome: Hi, welcome to Bici Milano. What can I do for you?
answer.fallback: I'm sorry but I do not know how to help you. Can I do anything else?
